definition: sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable/item sold at a loss
sacrifice
domestic animal/sacrificial animal
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Instead, he fell victim to his faith in the anti-fat propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 很可惜，他成了“反對脂肪”宣傳的犧牲品。

sentences.english: My friend was a victim of hit-and-run.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友是一個撞了人就跑綽了的犧牲品。

sentences.english: Afternoon newspapers were the first casualties.
"- the people's victim and life-long bond-slave, as they fancied her, might say to them.
sentences.chinese: 人們心目中的這個犧牲品和終身奴僕會對他們這樣說。

sentences.english: Yet they persist in seeing themselves as victims of daddy's job.
sentences.chinese: 然而，她們還是堅持認爲自己是父親事業的犧牲品。

sentences.english: An intricate trap that entangles or ensnares its victim.
sentences.chinese: 纏上或誘捕它的犧牲品的複雜的捕捉機。

sentences.english: He's been sacrificed to the Puritan cause.
sentences.chinese: 他成了新興清教徒事業的犧牲品。

sentences.english: But they would not forget the sacrificial and paschal aspect of the Supper.
sentences.chinese: 但他們不會忘記的犧牲品，並逾越方面的晚飯。

sentences.english: We are not all equally likely to fall prey.
sentences.chinese: 我們淪爲犧牲品的可能性不盡相同。

sentences.english: There was no more poignant victim of it than Marilyn Monroe.
sentences.chinese: 而瑪麗蓮夢露便是此種錯誤最慘烈的犧牲品。

sentences.english: IF YOU tolerate this, your children will be next.
sentences.chinese: 你若姑息此事，你的孩子將是下一個犧牲品。
他是連帶被株連的犧牲品。

sentences.english: Politicians and media bloviators will be vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 政治家和媒體人員將成爲犧牲品。

sentences.english: The lads don't join the union because they're frightened of being victimized.
sentences.chinese: 那幾個夥計沒加入工會是因爲害怕成爲犧牲品。

sentences.english: Audley, and do you select me as the victim of your monomania?
sentences.chinese: 難道你選定我作你那躁狂症的犧牲品嗎？

sentences.english: Moreover, the side in-between would be the severest victim in the battle of love, embarrassed in making any perspective choice.
sentences.chinese: 再者，局中人將成爲愛情戰爭最嚴重的犧牲品。

definition: to incite trouble/to stir up havoc
two-China (policy)
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
misconception/fallacy
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
to criticize (as a matter of principle)
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
to disrupt/to throw into disorder
militarism
to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
to capitulate
to bawl out/to reprimand severely
capitalist
political correctness/politically correct
